transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haanji, abhi aa rahi hai sir aawaz?
Customer: Aawaz toh aa rahi thi, bhi aapko bhi aawaz aa rahi hai. Bolo madam, bolo kya hua?
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, bolo, bolo kya hua bolo. Clear toh nahi aa rahi hai bolo.
Executive: Achha. Haan bolo madam kya hua?
Customer: Theek hai, haan. Wahi sir aapne concern raise kiya tha na ki aapko executive chahiye jo aapko samjha ke jaaye. Abhi woh aa gaye na aapke paas?
Customer: Ek baar aa gaya woh. Mere paas aaya tha parso, do din pehle aaya tha woh. Samjha gaya mere ko.
Executive: Achha, abhi samajh aa gayi sir aapko services saari?
Customer: Abhi samajh aa gaya hai. Abhi thoda hum, thoda, thoda function mein busy the aur thoda gala bhi busy hai isliye thoda use kam kar rahe hai par humko samajh aa gaya hai.
Executive: Samajh aa gaya na? Abhi aage se aapko sir kuch bhi issue hota hai na, kuch bhi. Theek hai, abhi aapka account na head office mein aa chuka hai, head office mein IndiaMART ke.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Branch office, haan branch office mein nahi hai abhi aapka account. Abhi head office mein hai. Head office se hi main baat kar rahi hu. Toh abhi aapko koi bhi issue hota hai, aap mujhe call kijiyega. Theek hai? Nahi samajh aata toh bhi, haan mujhe, mujhe mere manager sir hai unko aap kisi ko bhi call kar sakte hai. Abhi head office se aapka account handle kiya jayega. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Okay, okay madam.
Executive: Haan, haan kitne din pehle aaye the woh jo executive the?
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Physical, kitne din pehle aaye the aapko samjhane woh?
Customer: Do ya teen din, parso matlab, mangalwar ko aaye the woh.
Executive: Mangalwar ko aaye the?
Customer: Mangalwar ko aaye the.
Executive: Haan, but abhi aap busy rehne ki wajah se isko use nahi kar rahe ho sahi se?
Customer: Sahi se use nahi ho raha hai isme. Abhi thoda lead bhi hamara kam aa raha hai. Hamare type ka lead nahi aa raha hai. Jo lead aa raha hai na woh hamare type ka saadi nahi hai woh. Humne only bandhani saadi ka rakh rahe hai. Woh bandhani saadi ka koi lead nahi aa raha hai. Aur aa raha hai toh saadi aa raha hai. Ek do saadi, ek do saadi ka hum ek do saadi sell nahi karte. Hum wholesale ka kaam hai mera. Humko is, usko bhi maine bola tha humko is type ka lead nahi chahiye. Humko is type ka lead chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai, toh unhone aapko bataya ki waha pe ek bulk ka filter hota hai aap usko use kijiye?
Customer: Woh toh kiya humne, woh toh, woh toh dikhaya maine mere ko isme. Woh toh maine kiya bhi tha. Wholesale wala toh nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Aa raha hai toh hamare type ka jo nahi hai woh.
Customer: Nahi, main jo keh rahi hu. Hamare type ka only, hamara only, hamara only bandhej saadi ka hi kaam hai. Bandhej saadi rakhte hai hum. Mostly saadi aur suit. Bandhej saadi ka lead aa raha hai. Lead aa raha hai woh, woh bandhej ka saadi ka lead nahi aa raha hai. Dusri saadi ka lead aa raha hai aisa.
Executive: Bandhani, bandhani saadi mein aap deal karte ho?
Customer: Only bandhani saadi haan.
Executive: Haan bandhani saadi mein aap deal karte ho. Aapko sirf unhi ki buyleads chahiye?
Customer: Bas mere ko bandhani saadi hai, bandhani, bandhani dupatta, bandhani, bandhani ka lagti koi bhi hai toh bandhani saadi hai, bandhani dupatta hai, ya bandhani suit hai. Mere ko woh chahiye.
Executive: Achha ji.
Customer: Aapko sirf wahi chahiye?
Customer: Haan woh chahiye. Bandhani ka koi bhi hai toh.
Executive: Haan haan, ek toh aapko na bulk order chahiye ki aapko chota mota order nahi chahiye. Sir chota mota order ke liye na aapko waha pe ek bulk wala filter hoga. Jo, jo woh batao.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Bolo?
Customer: Haan woh toh bata gaya tha mere ko. Sab kuch maine samajh bhi liya hai.
Executive: Haan, haan bulk wala filter laga ke aap karoge kyunki dekho, sir platform pe buylead aapko sab tarah ki dikhegi. Aapko filter laga ke yeh cheez dekhni hai ki aap kitne deal kar rahe ho. Hai na? Aapko chote order ki bhi dikhegi, aapko bade order ki bhi dikhegi. Agar aapko bade order ki chahiye toh aap bulk wala filter lagao aapko bulk wali saari buylead dikhegi. Fir aap unko consume karo. Hai na?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Kya hai woh sab.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur haan aur jo aap bol rahe ho na yeh bandhani saadi mein aap deal karte ho. Abhi tak aapke paas ek bhi bandhani saadi ki buylead nahi aayi hai ya kam aati hai?
Customer: Aayi hai kam aati hai. Ek din kam aati hai.
Executive: Bandhani saadi ki. Aur yeh art silk ki saadi mein bhi aapne yeh product add kar rakhe hai art silk ki saadi.
Customer: Art silk ki saadi mein bhi bandhej chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Art silk saadi. Art silk saadi mein mere paas bandhej.
Customer: Ka hai, bandhani ka hai.
Executive: Achha woh bhi bandhani ka hi hai?
Customer: Haan bandhani mein mere paas sab, sab hoga alag alag sab bahut aate hai isme. Sab fabric mein bandhani ka kaam kiya hua hai mere paas aisa hai.
Executive: Achha achha. Toh sir aap mujhe na ek cheez woh batao, ek time batao. Ek na main aapki saari category jo hai saari jo aap bol rahe ho na bandhani wali saadi mein aap deal karte ho. Ek baar na main isme aapki saari category ek baar check karungi aapke product check karungi ki kaun kaun sa add hua hua hai. Woh saare aapko pooch pooch kar isme main add karungi jitna aap deal karte ho. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay. Main kya karu abhi aap usko?
Executive: Haan, haan yeh na main aapko video call pe samjha sakti hu. Video mein is wajah se aapko yaad hoga maine welcome call li thi na usi tarah. Theek hai? Jab bhi aap free hote hai, aap mujhe time bataiyega main us time aapko call karti hu ya aap mujhe call kar lena. Main ek ek discussion karungi aur jo aapke paas irrelevant buyleads aati hai woh bhi not relevant main aapko mark karaungi. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai madam. Haan, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Haan not relevant mark karaungi aur jo aap jis product mein aap deal karte ho woh bhi main I am interested mark karaungi kyunki waha pe kuch hote hai product jisme aap I am interested mark karoge kyunki aise hote hai jo main aapko bataungi. Toh aapke paas dheere dheere woh buyleads bhi aane chalu ho jayegi. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai madam. Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Haan aur, haan aur saamne se na koi aapko call aata hai toh aap utha.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Haan aur sir like ki aur aapka jo concern raise tha abhi agar aapko koi issue na ho toh main usko close kara du na yaha se abhi?
Customer: Kaunsa wala?
Executive: Wahi ki aapko offline woh aake batayenge. Woh unhone sikha diya na abhi toh woh solve ho gaya?
Customer: Ek baar toh aa gaya par shayad abhi ek do baar bulana padega lekin abhi dekh sakte ho. Ek baar toh clear ho gaya mere ko.
Executive: Haan ek baar toh clear ho gaya na aapko. Abhi jab bhi aapko bulana ho aap ya toh unko call kar lena ya ek baar mujhe call kar lena. Abhi kyunki hamari concern agar aapka problem solve ho gaya kyunki woh ek baar aa gaye hai. Theek hai? Toh yeh fir hume close karna hota hai toh hai na? Toh main isko close kar du na abhi?
Customer: Theek hai, kar do.
Executive: Aap mujhe, haan mujhe na direct call kar lena, mere manager ko call kar lena agar koi bhi issue hota hai aapko. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay, okay madam.
Executive: Haan, abhi na mere jo meri aur aapki baat hui hai uske regarding ek feedback aapko jayega mail par toh aap please positive feedback dijiyega. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Haanji, okay koi bhi issue ho.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Wants only bandhani saree, dupatta, and suits buyleads.

- Wants bulk orders, not small orders.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about bulk filter.

- Executive offered a video call to explain in detail.

- Executive will mark the products as interested.

- Executive will mark irrelevant buyleads as not relevant.

- Executive offered direct call to her or manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, bandhani, filter, video call, category
